articles.author: John Yang, Kaisha Young
articles.title: Why the unionization of Tennessee Volkswagen workers is a big breakthrough for UAW - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Employees at Volkswagen's plant in Chattanooga, Tennessee, have overwhelmingly voted to join the United Auto Workers union. It's the first time workers at a foreign car maker's plant in the American South have unionized, giving UAW a foothold in the least-uni…

articles.author: Prashant Jha
articles.title: US House passes $61 billion Ukraine aid after long wait - Hindustan Times
articles.description: American lawmakers passed four major national security bills after Republican Speaker took on his own party’s ultra-right faction | World News
articles.content: In a rare instance of bipartisanship, the US House of Representatives passed four major national security bills, the most important of which was a $60.8 billion aid package for Ukraine, on Saturday. … [+6860 chars]
